name: healthcare-payments-blockchain-fhir-demo
description: Healthcare Payments in Blockchain FHIR Demo

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run env:restart && npm run cc:start
scripts.start:debug: npm run build && npm run env:restart && npm run cc:start:debug
scripts.cc:start: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install; }; f
scripts.cc:start:debug: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install:debug; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade: f() { npm run cc:package -- financial org1; hurl upgrade financial node $1  -P ./chaincode-financial --collections-config ./packages/administration/dev-env/defaultCollections.config.json; }; f
scripts.user:fingerprint: f () { node -e "console.log(JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('$1', 'utf8')).enrollment.identity.certificate)" | openssl x509 -fingerprint -noout | cut -d '=' -f2 ; }; f
scripts.cc:package: f() { npm run lerna:build; chaincode-manager --config ./chaincode.config.json --output ./chaincode-financial package; }; f
scripts.cc:install: f() { hurl install financial node -P ./chaincode-financial --collections-config ./packages/administration/dev-env/defaultCollections.config.json; }; f
scripts.cc:install:debug: f() { hurl install financial node -P ./chaincode-financial --collections-config ./packages/administration/dev-env/defaultCollections.config.json --debug; }; f
